General.Name: Iron Road Limited
General.Description: Iron Road Limited explores for and evaluates iron ore properties in Australia. It owns 100% interest in the Central Eyre iron project located on the Eyre Peninsula of South Australia; and 90% interest in the Gawler iron project located in South Australia. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Adelaide, Australia. Iron Road Limited is a subsidiary of Sentient Executive GP IV, Limited.

2.Name: Mr. Jaroslaw K. Kopias ACIS, ACSA, AGIA, B.Com., BCom, C.S., CGP, CPA
2.Title: Company Sec.
